message: Hi Jonathan! That is a good point on making use of pre-made syntax definitions. When I was doing some initial research on this, I found a similar project for Notepad++. Hopefully I can make use of the syntax definitions in these projects. I am still a little unsure on which JavaScript highlighter I should make use of. It seems that the highlight.js library is pretty popular, but I am unsure at this point how easy it is to use.
